Triangulation Property¶

class TriangulationProperty.TriangulationProperty(points, trianglesIndices=None)[source]¶

TriangulationProperty - Class for holding and analyzing the triangulation data of a given point set

Attributes

Methods

AreaOfTriangle(index)[source]¶

Calculates the area of a specific triangle defined by its index in the triangles list

Parameters

index – The index of the triangle

Returns

The area of the triangle

AverageEdgeLength()[source]¶

Calculating the average edge length in the triangulation

AverageTriangleArea()[source]¶

Calculating the average area of all triangles

Returns

The average area of all the triangles

IsPointInTriangle(x, y, triangleIndex)[source]¶

Finding if a given point (x, y) is inside one of the triangles (defined by its index) @return: 1 - if the point is inside the triangle, 0 - if the point lies on one or more of the triangle edges, -1 - the point is outside the triangle

LengthOfAllEdges()[source]¶

Calculating edges’ length in the triangulation

LengthOfEdge(triangleIndex, edgeIndex)[source]¶

Calculating the length of a specific edge of one of the triangles

Parameters

  • triangleIndex – The index of a triangle

  • edgeIndex – The index of the edge * 0 - the edge between the first two points of the triangle, * 1 - the edge between the last two points of the triangle, * 2 - the edge between the first point and the last point)

MedianEdgeLength()[source]¶

Calculating the median edge length in the triangulation

MedianTriangleArea()[source]¶

Calculating the median area of all triangles

Returns

The median area of all the triangles

property NumberOfTriangles¶

Number of triangles

TotalArea()[source]¶

Calculates the total area enclosed in the triangulation

Returns

The total area of all the triangles in the triangulation

property TrianglesIndices¶

Indices of all the triangles

TrimEdgesByLength(maxLength)[source]¶

Removing all triangles which have an edge longer than a given threshold

Returns

Number of triangles removed

load(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Sets the TriagulationProperty attributes :param trianglesIndices: each row representing a triangle, holding the indices
